b.description: Ask Copilot or type / for commands

metadata.helpTextPrefix: You can ask me general programming questions, or chat with the following participants which have specialized expertise and can perform actions:
metadata.helpTextVariablesPrefix: You can also help me understand your question by using the following variables to give me extra context:

helpTextPostfix.value:
To have a great conversation, ask me questions as if I was a real programmer:

* **Show me the code** you want to talk about by having the files open and selecting the most important lines.
* **Make refinements** by asking me follow-up questions, adding clarifications, providing errors, etc.
* **Review my suggested code** and tell me about issues or improvements, so I can iterate on it.

You can also ask me questions about your editor selection by [starting an inline chat session](command:inlineChat.start).

Learn more about [GitHub Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/getting-started-with-github-copilot?tool=vscode&utm_source=editor&utm_medium=chat-panel&utm_campaign=2024q3-em-MSFT-getstarted) in [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/overview).

b.name: GitHub Copilot

response.value:
Snippet with error: `Home` Location of error: Inside the `
` tag WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) Detection Algorithm: Check if all `` tags have a `href` attribute that points to a valid destination. Explanation of Error: The `href` attribute in the anchor tag is set to "#", which doesn't lead to a valid destination. This could be confusing for users, especially those using screen readers. --- Snippet with error: `` Location of error: Inside the `
` tag WCAG Guideline violated: 4.1.1 Parsing Detection Algorithm: Check if all `id` attributes start with a letter. Explanation of Error: The `id` attribute in the radio input starts with a number, which is not compliant with HTML specifications. This could cause issues with CSS and JavaScript selectors, and may not be correctly interpreted by assistive technologies. --- Snippet with error: `
` Location of error: Inside the `` tag WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks Detection Algorithm: Check if there are mechanisms to bypass blocks of content that are repeated on multiple web pages. Explanation of Error: There are no skip links or other mechanisms to bypass the repeated navigation links in the header. This can make navigation difficult for keyboard-only users and screen reader users. --- Snippet with error: `` Location of error: Inside the `` tag WCAG Guideline violated: 3.3.1 Error Identification Detection Algorithm: Check if there are mechanisms to identify and describe errors in form input. Explanation of Error: There are no error identification mechanisms in the form. If a user makes an error in input, there is no way for them to know what the error is or how to correct it.

followups.message: What are some guidelines for creating accessible forms in HTML?
